entries.content: Objections are opportunities to provide more information and clarify the vision.
entries.notes: Implied when discussing the effort put into the deck to address potential skepticism.

entries.content: Show effort and preparation to turn initial skepticism into curiosity.
entries.notes: Demonstrated by creating a detailed deck to address potential objections upfront.

entries.content: Treat objections as requests for more information, not rejections.
entries.notes: Implied in the approach to handling initial interest with detailed follow-up.

entries.content: Presenting a detailed deck to address potential doubts and show commitment.
entries.notes: Illustrates how to handle objections by providing comprehensive information.

focus_area: Objection Mindset: Objections = info requests, not rejections
